title: [Epidemiology] States with more gun laws have lower youth gun violence, finds a new study, which examined data from 2005 and 2017 across several US states. Gun violence among children is a significant public health concern in the US, and firearms are the third leading cause of death among children ages 1 to 17.

[Medicine] MIT researchers claim newly published EpiMap is the most comprehensive map yet of human noncoding DNA, offering up a map of noncoding annotations, together with the modules, upstream regulators, downstream targets, disease variants, and interpretation of disease variants
